domain.interactions

Class Commands

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.interactions.Commands

  • public class Commands
extends java.lang.Object
    The main collection of Command's as well as the main logic for managing all the commands. It is from here, the commands are validate and checked for parameters etc.
    See Also:
    Command, InteractionsController, Parser

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.List<Command> COMMAND_WORDS
      A list of all the Command's.
      private static Command lastCommand
      This is where the last called Command is stored.
      private static java.lang.String lastParameter
      This is where the last called parameter is stored.

    • Field Detail

      • COMMAND_WORDS

        private static final java.util.List<Command> COMMAND_WORDS
        A list of all the Command's. These are initialized in the init() method.

      • lastCommand

        private static Command lastCommand
        This is where the last called Command is stored. (Is sat to the Clear command as default)

      • lastParameter

        private static java.lang.String lastParameter
        This is where the last called parameter is stored.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Commands

        private Commands()

    • Method Detail

      • init

        static void init()
        Initializes the commands. This will add all the different commands to the COMMAND_WORDS list.

      • validateCommand

        static Command validateCommand(java.lang.String commandWord,
                               java.lang.String parameter)
        Checks to see if the inserted Strings match any Command. Will then return the Command with an assigned parameter (if given).
        Parameters:
        commandWord - The String to validate. Needs to be the name of the Command.
        parameter - The parameter for the Command.
        Returns:
        Returns null if no command matched.

      • showCommands

        static void showCommands()
        Displays the COMMAND_WORDS to the user.

      • getCommand

        static Command getCommand(int index)
        Gets the Command based in its index.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the Command.
        Returns:

      • getCommand

        static Command getCommand(java.lang.String name)
        Get the Command based on its name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the Command.
        Returns:

      • getCommandwords

        static java.util.List<Command> getCommandwords()
        Get all the COMMAND_WORDS.
        Returns:
        A List of command words.

      • getLastCommandName

        static java.lang.String getLastCommandName()
        Get the name of the last valid command called.
        Returns:

      • getLastParameter

        static java.lang.String getLastParameter()
        Get the last valid parameter.
        Returns:
